[DERIVED] Derived Adverse Events

Source: R/data.R
AE.Rd

Adverse events derived dataset.

Usage

data(AE)

Format

A data frame with 3844 observations and 44 variables.

Source

For more details see the help vignette: vignette(topic = 'ADNIMERGE2-Derived-Data', package = 'ADNIMERGE2')

Details

  • STUDYID character Study Identifier , with character options: ADNI

  • DOMAIN character Domain Abbreviation , with character options: AE

  • USUBJID character Unique Subject Identifier

  • AEGRPID character Group ID , with character options: ADNI3, ADNI4

  • AESEQ integer Sequence Number Range value: 1, ..., 32

  • AETERM character Reported Term for the Adverse Event

  • AELLT character Lowest Level Term

  • AELLTCD character Lowest Level Term Code

  • AEDECOD character Dictionary-Derived Term

  • AEPTCD character Preferred Term Code

  • AEHLT character High Level Term

  • AEHLTCD character High Level Term Code

  • AEHLGT character High Level Group Term

  • AEHLGTCD character High Level Group Term Code

  • AESOC character Primary Sytem Organ Class

  • AESOCCD character Primary Sytem Organ Class Code

  • AESEV character Severity/Intensity , with character options: Mild, Moderate, Severe

  • AESER character Serious Event , with character options: No, Yes

  • AEOUT character Outcome of Adverse Event , with character options: Not recovered/Not resolved, Recovered/Resolved, Recovering/Resolving, Fatal, Recovered/Resolved with sequelae, Unknown

  • AESCONG character Congential Anomaly or Birth Defect , with character options: No

  • AESDISAB character Persist or Signif Disability/Incapacity , with character options: No, Yes

  • AESDTH character Results in Death , with character options: No, Yes

  • AESHOSP character Requires or Prologns Hospitalization , with character options: Yes, No

  • AESLIFE character Is Life Threating , with character options: Yes, No

  • AESMIE character Other Medically Important Serious Event , with character options: No, Yes

  • AECONTRT character Concomitant or Additional Trtmnt Given , with character options: No, Yes

  • AERELAD character Related to Early Stage or Progression of AD , with character options: Not related, Unlikely, Probably, Possibly, Definitely

  • AERELCM character Related to Concomitant Therapy , with character options: Not related, Possibly, Unlikely, Probably, Definitely

  • AERELFLRBTBN character Related to Florbetaben Tracer , with character options: Not related, Unlikely, Possibly, Definitely, Probably

  • AERELFLRBPR character Related to Florbetapir Tracer , with character options: Not related, Unlikely, Possibly, Probably

  • AEHIMG character Related to PET/MRI Imaging Procedure , with character options: Not related, Unlikely, Possibly, Probably, Definitely

  • AERELTAU character Related to Flotaucipir Tracer , with character options: Not related, Possibly, Probably, Unlikely

  • AERELNAV character Related to NAV-4694 Tracer , with character options: Not related, Possibly

  • AERELMK character Related to MK-6240 Tracer , with character options: Not related, Unlikely

  • AERELPI character Related to PI-2620 Tracer , with character options: Not related

  • AEHLUMB character Related to Lumbar Puncture , with character options: Not related, Definitely, Probably, Possibly, Unlikely

  • AERELCOVID character Related to COVID-19 Illness , with character options: Not related, Definitely (Confirmed COVID-19 test), Unlikely, Probably, Possibly

  • AERELPAN character Related to COVID-19 Pandemic Disruption , with character options: Not related, Unlikely, Definitely, Possibly, Probably

  • AERELATESP character Related to Other Study Procedure(s) , with character options: Not related, Unlikely, Probably, Possibly, Definitely

  • VISITNUM numeric Visit Number Range value: -1, ..., 48

  • VISIT character Visit Name

  • EPOCH character Epoch , with character options: Follow-up, Baseline, Screening

  • AESTDTC character Start Date/Time of Adverse Event

  • AEENDTC character End Date/Time of Adverse Event

Author

adni-data@googlegroups.com
